This guitar features a basswood body and a bolt-on maple neck with a rosewood fingerboard. The fingerboard has Kirk Hammett's signature skull and crossbones inlays just like the other signature models he has! The neck has an extra thin U-shaped contour which is very comfortable for playing fast with ease. It also has ESP designed pickups with an ESP designed Floyd rose as well.
